column4: I am getting can't update errors, should I wait or is something else going on.  Is anyone else able to easily upgrade?
the servers are gettign bogged down... either wait a few days, or download a torrent
well, the cd is probably faster, and you don't have to worry about what happens if for some reason your internet connection goes down
well I did all three to the same machine.  After I did the CD, I did apt-get upgrade and it took a really long time.  I just did apt-get dist-upgrade and installed about 100MB of stuff
